dct_title_s: Maps of the New Jersey College for Women and College Avenue Campus of Rutgers University (1947)
dct_description_sm: Two maps depicting the New Jersey College for Women (later Douglass College) and the College Avenue Campus of Rutgers University located in New Brunswick, New Jersey.
dct_rights_sm: This object has been provided by Rutgers University Libraries Special Collections after a copyright, permissions, and usage rights evaluation.
